channel.title: DespairScape 317. PI based. Dungeoneering skill\gear. Economy like no other!
channel.description:
Please note that this server is NOT public and wont be for another week or two (Considering the development stage it's in)
If you would like to apply please visit the website: *
::: :::Positions available::: ::: -----------------------------------Owner 1/1----------------------------- -----------------------------------Co-owner 1/1----------------------- -----------------------------------Head of Staff 0/1 -----------------------------------Admin's 0/2---------------------- -----------------------------------Mod's 0/2--------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=14pt]Server information's:[/size][/b] -Vote system where you can earn vote Levels + points to spend on dungeoneering gear like Torva -Added Primal and all the other dungeoneering gear. (So many of them) -Custom Dungeoneering dungeon's + custom shops -Animated Frost Dragons 100% -Used James guide for in game highscores(had to edit it a little bit cause it was still giving errors) -Slayer Helm assembly -Added slayer points and made them gainable -Clipped Firemaking -Added a Dungeoneering base + Tokens\Custom level interface + gear -Added a bankpin system -Ripped the event system from Project Fatality (Being honest haha ) -Also ripped shops\dungeoneering system from Rune-World -Rune-world's home (Fairy place) -Attempted to fix pest control(602 npc make the portals respawn I suggest just add new a new minigame) -Worked on player clipping a little as well -a nice ::stafflist, ::home, ::corp, and a couple of other commands. Hand Cannon Full morrigan javelins and throwing axes Coinshare Full Skill cape emotes! Real turmoil! New 602 animation and gfx’s Correct spirit shield bonuses and EFFECTS! Clue Scrolls!! Full Slayer Point System 60+ People on at all times Crystal Key chest have the chance to get 3rd age and rares New OverLoads Pots Full working chaotic weapons Full Godwars Turmoil! Working LootShare Full functioning Clan Chat Working obelisk teleporters Kbd Dagganoths All inboune rings ex berserker ring(i) Full weapon specials and emotes Full autocasting Constant Updates Arcane Stream necklaces All Spirit Shields Full weapon specials and emotes Pvp armours Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes Shops There is training but you can start off by doing :ure ! Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes Perfect Hybriding Open Staff Slots Running on dedicated NO Lag 24/7 Full Skilling for the Non pkers Fight pits Full dueling with staking Full pest control Rare PK ring Economy like no other ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Wesbite: * Rylee's msn: Rylee239@hotmail.com Want to talk to me right away? Visit : * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Please contact me or visit the forums if you would like to apply Sorry no pictures dont have time :\ Please leave nice comments i've worked very hard on this :P [i](Not asking for your opinion on the server, just asking to recruit staff plain simple)[/i]

item.title: DespairScape 317. PI based. Dungeoneering skill\gear. Economy like no other!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:7, topic:449106”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=552002.msg4044627#msg4044627 date=1341979847]
What I meant, but oh well…
[/quote]No, you said you cannot get them approved anymore due to the advertisement board, which is untrue.

@thread: post some pictures or other media, perhaps? And if I remember, you’re not allowed to post a thread to recruit staff only.[/quote]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546760.0.html I thought Taharok posted it somewhere… I misunderstood what he was saying.

[quote=“Rylee_, post:6, topic:449106”]i’m still new to mopar’s fantastic rules -.-[/quote]^lol’d some of the mods are even better

Read full topic

item.title: DespairScape 317. PI based. Dungeoneering skill\gear. Economy like no other!
item.dc:creator: @Rylee1 Rylee_
item.description:
@Rylee1 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:5, topic:449106”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=552002.msg4044346#msg4044346 date=1341953357]

[quote author=runewings317 link=topic=552002.msg4044147#msg4044147 date=1341939486]
You can’t post a link to your website without being approved by a moderator… And I think you can’t get them approved anymore cause of the new advertisement board.
[/quote]Only partially true. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546756.0.html
Only links in the advertisement board don’t have to be approved. Outside of that board, they need to be approved.
[/quote]What I meant, but oh well…

[quote author=Rylee_ link=topic=552002.msg4044615#msg4044615 date=1341978339]
iCreatedHorror, thank you I really am offended when people do that :S. It makes me feel bad haha
[/quote]May I ask how I offended you? I think I put that quite nicely… Other people usually yell and curse people that post links like that out. :([/quote]

Sorry i just, im sensitive haha yea :S but ty though either way i’m still new to mopar’s fantastic rules -.-

Read full topic

item.title: DespairScape 317. PI based. Dungeoneering skill\gear. Economy like no other!
item.dc:creator: @Rylee1 Rylee_
item.description:
@Rylee1 wrote:

Please note that this server is NOT public and wont be for another week or two (Considering the development stage it’s in)

If you would like to apply please visit the website: *

::: :::Positions available::: :::
-----------------------------------Owner 1/1-----------------------------
-----------------------------------Co-owner 1/1-----------------------
-----------------------------------Head of Staff 0/1
-----------------------------------Admin’s 0/2----------------------
-----------------------------------Mod’s 0/2---------------------------

[size=14pt]Server information’s:[/size]
-Vote system where you can earn vote Levels + points to spend on dungeoneering gear like Torva
-Added Primal and all the other dungeoneering gear. (So many of them)
-Custom Dungeoneering dungeon’s + custom shops
-Animated Frost Dragons 100%
-Used James guide for in game highscores(had to edit it a little bit cause it was still giving errors)
-Slayer Helm assembly
-Added slayer points and made them gainable
-Clipped Firemaking
-Added a Dungeoneering base + Tokens\Custom level interface + gear
-Added a bankpin system
-Ripped the event system from Project Fatality (Being honest haha )
-Also ripped shops\dungeoneering system from Rune-World
-Rune-world’s home (Fairy place)
-Attempted to fix pest control(602 npc make the portals respawn I suggest just add new a new minigame)
-Worked on player clipping a little as well
-a nice ::stafflist, ::home, ::corp, and a couple of other commands.
Hand Cannon
Full morrigan javelins and throwing axes
Coinshare
Full Skill cape emotes!
Real turmoil!
New 602 animation and gfx’s
Correct spirit shield bonuses and EFFECTS!
Clue Scrolls!!
Full Slayer Point System
60+ People on at all times
Crystal Key chest have the chance to get 3rd age and rares
New OverLoads Pots
Full working chaotic weapons
Full Godwars
Turmoil!
Working LootShare
Full functioning Clan Chat
Working obelisk teleporters
Kbd
Dagganoths
All inboune rings ex berserker ring(i)
Full weapon specials and emotes
Full autocasting
Constant Updates
Arcane Stream necklaces
All Spirit Shields
Full weapon specials and emotes
Pvp armours
Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes
Shops
There is training but you can start off by doing :ure !
Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes
Perfect Hybriding
Open Staff Slots
Running on dedicated NO Lag 24/7
Full Skilling for the Non pkers
Fight pits
Full dueling with staking
Full pest control
Rare PK ring
Economy like no other

Wesbite: *
Rylee’s msn: Rylee239@hotmail.com
Want to talk to me right away? Visit : *

Please contact me or visit the forums if you would like to apply
Sorry no pictures dont have time :
Please leave nice comments i’ve worked very hard on this
(Not asking for your opinion on the server, just asking to recruit staff plain simple)

Read full topic
